song_name: We Were Happy (Taylor’s Version) (From The Vault)
lyrics:
73 contributorstranslationstürkçeespañolсрпскиportuguêsmagyardeutschpolskiукраїнськаfrançaiswe were happy taylor’s version from the vault lyricsverse 1
we used to walk along the streets
when the porch lights were shinin bright
before i had somewhere to be
back when we had all night
and we were happy
i do recall a good while back
we snuck into the circus
you threw your arms around my neck
back when i deserved it
and we were happy

chorus
when it was good baby it was good baby
we showed em all up
no one could touch the way we
laughed in the dark talkin bout your daddys farm
we were gonna buy someday
and we were happy

verse 2
we used to watch the sun go down
on the boats in the water
thats sorta how i feel right now
and goodbyes so much harder
cause we were happy
see taylor swift liveget tickets as low as 172you might also likechorus
when it was good baby it was good baby
we showed em all up
no one could touch the way we
laughed in the dark talkin bout your daddys farm
we were gonna buy someday
and we were happy

postchorus
we were happy

bridge
oh i hate those voices
tellin me im not in love anymore
but they dont give me choices
and thats what these tears are for

prechorus
cause we were happy
we were happy

chorus
when it was good baby it was good baby
we showed em all up
no one could touch the way we
laughed in the dark talkin bout your daddys farm
and you were gonna marry me
and we were happy

we were happy
oh we were happy18embed
